main event: A witness describes seeing a UFO over High Island Block Co. summer village resort near Galveston, Texas in June 1956.
interesting points: The witness reported a loud roaring noise just before seeing the object., The object was estimated to have a 12 or 13 foot span., The sighting occurred around midnight on a deserted beach., The witness initially expressed disbelief about their own experience., Hand-drawn sketches of the UFO were included, depicting a dome-shaped object and an ellipsoidal shape.
witness description: An 18-year-old young man from Beaumont, Texas.
